item.title: Azure Functions - Getting Started
item.description: This article covers my experience with Azure Functions. Azure Functions is Microsoft’s PaaS offering in the relative new serverless application space and has been in the spotlight for quite some time now. Applications development has seen an evolution in the last few years. Monolithic applications have given way to smaller autonomous services - services that are responsible for their own data, are easier to manage and with their own deployment cycle.
